title: Input, $$t$$
text: The input is $$t=30$$, so $$30$$ minutes after noon, which is equivalent to 12:30pm.

title: Output
text: $$f'(t)=rate$$ of change of the volume in the tank over time (in gallons/minute), so $$f'(30)=rate$$ of change of the volume in the tank at $$t=30$$.

title: $$\frac{Increasing}{Decreading}$$
text: The rate of change is negative, so we say the volume in the tank is decreasing.

title: Explanation
text: At 12:30pm, the volume in the tank is decreasing at a rate of $$20$$ gallons per minute.
